coreAttributes.name: bo-staff
coreAttributes.description: A long shaft, usually the same height as its user. A popular weapon for martial art practioners as it is great for conditioning and coordination, as well as being multi-facated with its usage.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Swing your bo-staff at [npc2.name] and strike [npc2.herHim]!
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] bo-staff as [npc.she] [npc.verb(ready)] [npc.herself] to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] bo-staff, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to strike [npc2.name] in the chest; the ethereal arcane blade passing through [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc2.her] energy!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] bo-staff, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to swipe through [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the ethereal staff and drain [npc2.her] energy!
With a quick [npc.step] forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swing)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] bo-staff, smacking the staff into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!
hitDescriptions.criticalHitText: Expertly sidestepping around [npc2.namePos] attempt to block [npc.her] attack, [npc.name] [npc.verb(deal)] a devastating strike with [npc.her] bo-staff!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] bo-staff, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to strike [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] bo-staff, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick [npc.step] forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swing)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] bo-staff, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
